description: This file defines custom operator new and delete functions with file name and line number parameters for memory management, conditioned on certain macros. It includes licensing information and header guards.

operator new[](unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)
operator delete(void *p, const char *file, int line)
operator delete[](void *p, const char *file, int line)
